definition: Mt Tai 泰山[Tai4 Shan1] in Shandong/abbr. for Thailand
surname Ji/family name of the Zhou Dynasty 周代[Zhou1 dai4] (1046-256 BC)

sentences.english: He is expected to visit the Taj Mahal, 22, visited India's financial hub Mumbai.
sentences.chinese: 他預計22日參觀泰姬陵，訪問印度金融中心孟買。

sentences.english: The main draw in agra is of course the taj mahal.
sentences.chinese: 印度阿格拉市主要的名勝當然是泰姬陵了。

sentences.english: The Taj Mahal itself forms the centerpiece of a 42-acre complex.
sentences.chinese: 泰姬陵的中心墓室錯綜複雜，佔地42英畝。

sentences.english: The marble of the Taj Mahal is quite intact — it is very high quality.
sentences.chinese: 泰姬陵的年夜理石質量很好，所以此刻依然保留無缺。

sentences.english: But never again would he be allowed to visit it-until he was buried next to his wife.
sentences.chinese: 可惜的是直到他死後與妻子合葬才又回到泰姬陵。

sentences.english: Some of the injured were evacuated from the Taj on luggage carts.
sentences.chinese: 一些傷者被放在行李車上，從泰姬陵酒店撤離。

sentences.english: It's said that he spent the rest of his days gazing at the Taj Mahal from a window.
sentences.chinese: 據說，在其餘生中，他經常透過一個窗戶凝視泰姬陵。

sentences.english: But nobody is interested in saving the Taj Mahel.
sentences.chinese: 但是沒有人對保護泰姬陵感興趣。

sentences.english: The Taj Mahal has tiny colorful stones inlaid in white marble.
sentences.chinese: 泰姬陵有無數細小的彩石嵌入白色大理石中。

sentences.english: What prompted you to focus on the Taj Mahal?
sentences.chinese: 是什麼促使你把重點放在泰姬陵上呢？

sentences.english: Construction of the Taj Mahal began in the same year as Mumtaz’ death.
sentences.chinese: 泰姬去世的那一年泰姬陵開始動工。

sentences.english: Shah Jahan built the Taj Majal as a monument to his undying love for his wife.
sentences.chinese: 沙迦汗建造了泰姬陵來表達對他的妻子永恆的愛。

sentences.english: Construction of the Taj Mahal began in the same year as Mumtaz's death.
sentences.chinese: 泰姬去世的那一年泰姬陵開始動工。

sentences.english: The history connected with the Taj Mahal is a very poignant one.
sentences.chinese: 與泰姬陵有關的歷史很令人心酸。

sentences.english: It was built on the bank of the Jumna River in Agra, India.
sentences.chinese: 泰姬陵坐落在印度阿格拉的亞穆納河畔。

sentences.english: The Taj Mahal meeting room sits next to the John Pierpont Morgan lecture hall.
sentences.chinese: 泰姬陵會議室的一側是約翰皮爾龐特摩根講堂。

definition: Taj Mahal/abbr. to 泰姬陵[Tai4 ji1 ling2]
Angkor Wat, temple complex in Cambodia
Potala, winter palace of Dalai Lamas in Lhasa, Tibet
